Body:
"""
        Test that a ValueError gets raised when attempting to write a
        Credential struct missing credential type data to a data stream.
        """
credential = objects.Credential(credential_value=objects.
    UsernamePasswordCredential(username='Fred', password='password1'))
stream = utils.BytearrayStream()
args = stream,
self.assertRaisesRegex(ValueError,
    'Credential struct missing the credential type.', credential.write, *args)
